Name: BattleStick 2
About the game: FREE 2D MULTIPLAYER game! You fight in 2D arenas against stickmen characters controlled by REAL people! Up to 20 players in online multiplayer battle modes Play with up to 4 friends in Squad mode TONS of stickman skins, weapons, throwables and headgear are available Funny physics for stick figures with advanced controls Full of memes and comical sounds Unique physics! During battles, you will be met with a number of unique and funny physicsâ€™ situations. You will be able to chop off stickman bodies into pieces, jump unrealistically high and blow up dead stickman bodies. A diverse range of equipment items! You will purchase and experience different types of weapons, ranging from melee to ranged weapons; stickman skins of trendy memes, historical characters, and MORE! You will be able to take part in themed battles like Elves vs Orcs along with themed maps. It will be extended to a lot of themes, like Romans vs Gauls and Vikings vs Saxons. We want you to laugh! Having fun and laughing hard is the most important part of the BattleStick franchise. Our secret sauce is to pair funny physics with any type of sound out of their original context, like a dog barking sound when you receive damage. So grab a drink, relax, and come play with us!
